title: Hey.... Riot
body:
Well. First of all I would like to say Hi and thank you for this amazing game that has kept me entertained for months. So I read about this post where you guys would give people some extra RP if they needed it, annnd I guess I need 100 more RP in order to get something I wanted. I won't be able to because it would be over by the time I get to recharge my RP. It would be over. If this sounds like too much, it's fine. I sort of miscalculated of how much RP I would have left. To make everything short. Riot, do you still give out RP to people and if you still do can I have 100 RP? I know it sounds like a lot but I just need that much to get the Icon. I have my championship shards ready and everything. I have 155 RP right now. If you were to be generous and accept it, I will be in your debt forever. Or Randomly take 100 RP when I have that much. in the near future.

            P.S - I know there will be some comments flaming me or calling me stupid and I'll take that. I really was.    
                                                                                                                                                        Happy Halloween and Merry Worlds 2016,
                                                                                                                                                                    _FeelingFlames_

replies.body: You have a fair request, and flaming isn't common here so don't worry!  Reach out to us with your specific request through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or even [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport).  I can't make any guarantees, but we'll see what we can do for you!
Dang, it looks like it was rejected. But thanks for the help, maybe I'll learn from my mistakes for next years' worlds.
Thank you for replying, you have been a big help to me today!
